thread.section_title: Asara Wine Estate & Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Underrated restaurant with excellent food & attentive service
thread.title_full: Underrated restaurant with excellent food & attentive service - Review of Asara Wine Estate & Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: MJ A
title: Underrated restaurant with excellent food & attentive service
text: We stayed at Asara & dined on the Saturday night. After a less then impressive meal at Waterkloof we were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food & excellent service. My fillet was cooked to perfection. Not trying to overly complicate food with too many competing flavours allowed the main ingredients to be savoured & enjoyed. Lovely evening & recommended.
